rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0001
rows.name: I expected no less from NLA's #1 team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0003_02
rows.name:
The Ganglion really are afraid, you know.[ST:page p1=60 ]Even Luxaar—their leader—
trembles at the idea we might get our bodies back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0004
rows.name:
That's why he had me stick around here—
to keep you out of his tendrils.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0005
rows.name:
You knew we had no choice—
we had to chase after that stolen data terminal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0006
rows.name:
None of this will matter soon.
Once they destroy the Lifehold Core, and all of us with it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0008
rows.name: You don't sound so excited anymore.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0009
rows.name: Course I'm excited, why wouldn't I be...?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0010
rows.name:
We can finally stop living this goddamned lie.
We'll all be free, at last.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0012
rows.name:
How does that free anyone?
Instead of reuniting with our real flesh and blood?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0013
rows.name:
Wrong. We're already dead, Lin.
Our flesh and blood burned away with the Earth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0014
rows.name: Listen, Lao, we don't have time for a debate here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0015
rows.name:
We came here for that terminal,
and we're taking it back with us, whether you like it or not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs11080100_MSG0017
rows.name:
You wouldn't wanna hear this, would you?
Or have them hear it. Fair enough.[ST:wait ]
